A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was easily one of the worst of the Star Wars movies...Leia acting like Harry Potter\, zooming through space...really?  Luke has gone from one of the most iconic and strongest heroes to a whiny pouting hermit. Chewie was...not even in the movie...he didn't even do anything of note. I have seen the original movies easily over 60 times...this one I am not going to see it again.
